articles.author: Will Stewart, Will Stewart
articles.title: Russia kicks off massive war games with 200,000 troops right on Europe's doorstep - The Mirror
articles.description: Within 'spitting distance' of Europe’s doorstep, the Russian show of strength covers over 1,200 miles and is being monitored closely by concerned NATO allies
articles.content:
Huge Russian war games kicked off today on Europe's doorstep - involving some 200,000 troops - in a massive show of strength by Vladimir Putin.
The Zapad-2021 military drills include Belarus and run… [+4709 chars]

articles.title: WHO: Mu Strain of Coronavirus Stirs Concerns - Novinite.com
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency said Thursday a coronavirus variant known as "Mu" could be cause for concern, although there is no data yet to show it will overtake the dominant Delta strain, AFP reported. Mu, which was first identified in Colombia in January a…
